---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---



- load a .conf file
- get the x and y limits
- paint the background black
- parse the conf file for molecules.
- plot them 


```{r}
xdim = 100
ydim = 125
plot(NA, xlim = c(0,xdim),ylim=c(0,ydim),asp = 1)
rect(xleft = 0,xright = xdim,ybottom = 0,ytop=ydim,col="black")
```
